abilities.name: Heavy Caliber
abilities.details: Eleanor has a fixed [db]attack speed[/]. Bonus attack speed she gains is converted into bonus [ad]physical power[/] instead.[n]Eleanor's basic attack has increased [bf]range[/] and deals bonus [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]).[n]However, after every basic attack, Eleanor must chamber a new round, [db]preventing[/] her from attacking for a very short duration.

abilities.name: Tungsten Shot
abilities.details: Eleanor begins charging her rifle, gaining increased [bf]range[/] for Tungsten Shot, but [db]rooting[/] herself in the process.[n]Upon release, she fires a massive, high-velocity bolt in a long line, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to the first enemy hit.[n]If fully charged, the shot deals [bf]higher damage[/] to the first target and can pierce through [bf]multiple enemies[/], but deals [db]reduced damage[/] to subsequent targets.

abilities.name: Invisible Wire
abilities.details: On first cast, Eleanor attaches a small cloaking device to a terrain. On second cast, Eleanor attaches a second device to another terrain.[n]Once both are set, an invisible wire connects them. If an enemy hero walks through the line, they are [db]revealed[/] and [db]rooted[/] for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Tactical Retreat
abilities.details: Eleanor fires a low-caliber blank into the ground in front of her and uses the recoil to vault backward.[n]Enemies hit by the blank are dealt [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) and [db]slowed[/] for a short duration.

abilities.name: Siege Protocol
abilities.details: Eleanor anchors her heavy armor into the ground, becoming [db]rooted[/] for a duration. While anchored, she gains expanded vision of her surrounding.[n]Eleanor can fire 3 powerful long-range shells (number of shells increase with [hp]ability level[/]). Each shot requires a second reload delay before the next can be fired.[n]Each shell deals [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) and shatters the target's [db]physical resistance[/] for a few seconds.[n]Upon hit, the target is [db]revealed[/] and [db]slowed[/] for half a second.[n]Eleanor can re-activate the ability early to pack up her gear and end the protocol.
